definition: see 恃強欺弱|恃强欺弱[shi4 qiang2 qi1 ruo4]
strong/powerful/better/slightly more than/vigorous/violent/best in their category, e.g. see 百強|百强[bai3 qiang2]
to force/to compel/to strive/to make an effort
to approach/to rise high/thick ice/to insult or maltreat
weak/feeble/young/inferior/(following a decimal or fraction) slightly less than

sentences.english: John stuck up to the bully without the least timidity.
sentences.chinese: 約翰毫不畏怯地反抗那個恃強凌弱的傢伙。

sentences.english: We might think that bullies are quite different from the victims of bullying.
sentences.chinese: 我們可能認爲恃強凌弱者和被欺負者有很大的不同。

sentences.english: Bullying is a problem from elementary school to the corporate suite.
sentences.chinese: 恃強凌弱是一個存在於從小學到企業集團的問題。

sentences.english: A world where the rule of law supplants the rule of the jungle.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個用法治取代恃強凌弱規則的世界。
